name: Downgrade (swong839)
description:
You wake up to find that the space station that you are on has been taken over by aliens. Use your powers to defeat them and take back the space station! But progressing means giving up your powers, so choose carefully. 

Controls: (to go back to menu, press esc)

Movement: WASD       Dash: Left Shift        Shoot: J         Slow time: K        Droid attack: L

Developed by:

Tom Bar Ezer Ayalon (toba1020.itch.io)

Wes Pickering (wespickering.itch.io)

Darren Wang (damonkeyboi.itch.io)

Sabrina Wong (swong839.itch.io)
